description: Identifying string linked to the individual or animal being studied, provided by the data contributor
Name of the cohort the individual belongs to
valid values: Centenarian,US Family,Denmark Family,The Osteoporotic Fractures in Men (MrOS) Study,Study of Osteoporotic Fractures (SOF),The Health, Aging, and Body Composition Study (HealthABC),Cardiovascular Health Study (CHS), Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable

description: Unique identifier for the study, assigned by the DCC

valid values: BU, PT, NY, DK, Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable

description: Indicate which longitudinal visit for the individual the data comes from, provided by the data contributor's data dictionary
valid values: n/a (unique to each data contributor), Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable

description: Indicate the geographic region for the individual (shown as ex. "840")
valid values: World Bank country codes (not listed for purposes of this RFC), Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable

description: Indicate the consent group for the individual, provided by the data contributor's data dictionary
valid values: n/a (unique to each data contributor), Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable

description: The taxonomic ranking including both species and subspecies the individual belongs to.
valid values: Human, Rodent, Bird, Mammal, Primate, Other, Unknown Not collected, Not applicable

description: The biological sex of the individual
valid values: Male, Female, Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable

White, Black or African American, Asian, American Indian or Alaska Native, Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander, Multiracial, Other race, Prefer not to answer, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable
ontology: Sage Bionetworks, AMA Manual of Style, 11th edition, NCI Thesaurus

valid values: Not Hispanic or Latino,Hispanic or Latino,Prefer not to answer, Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable

description: A coded value specifying the self-declared ethnic origination independent of racial origination, provided by the data contributor's data dictionary
Age of the individual (age in years of the individual at first recorded study event (enrollment, visit, observation, sample collection, survey completion, etc.)
Whether the individual has been diagnosed with a condition or disease (physical and/or cognitive), \True" indicates the individual has been diagnosed"
valid values: True, False, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable
HPO, MONDO, MAXO codes or labels (not listed for purposes of this RFC), Other, Unknown, Not collected, Not applicable
